MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G45 postcode area of Glasgow, affecting properties in Drakemire Drive. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9:55am. Our engineers have arrived at the local substation and are investigating a suspected blown fuse.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:48am on Friday, 16 October 2020
